languages.text: "Именем Императора и волею главы династии фон Валанциус приказываю вам остановиться. На этом корабле только я — и законы Империума — решают, кому жить, кому умирать".

traits.locale_text: "Именем Императора и волею главы династии фон Валанциус приказываю тебе остановиться. На этом корабле только я — и законы Империума — решают, кому жить, кому умирать".

languages.text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."
languages.original_text: "Именем Императора и волею главы династии фон Валанциус приказываю вам остановиться. На этом корабле только я — и законы Империума — решают, кому жить, кому умирать".

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."
"In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."
"In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."
"In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."
"In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下の名において、そして自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスの意志により命令する。止まれ。この船では、私と帝国の法のみが、誰が生き、誰が死ぬのかを決めることができる」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下の名において、そして自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスの意志により命令する。止まれ。この船では、私と帝国の法のみが、誰が生き、誰が死ぬのかを決めることができる」

languages.text: “以帝皇的名义和行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的意志，我命令你住手。在这艘船上，只有我，还有帝国的法律，才能决定谁生谁死。”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: “以帝皇的名义和行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的意志，我命令你住手。在这艘船上，只有我，还有帝国的法律，才能决定谁生谁死。”

languages.text: "Im Namen des Imperators und beim Willen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius, ich befehle Euch, aufzuhören. Auf diesem Schiff darf niemand außer mir — und den Gesetzen des Imperiums — diktieren, wer lebt und wer stirbt."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Imperators und beim Willen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius, ich befehle Euch, aufzuhören. Auf diesem Schiff darf niemand außer mir — und den Gesetzen des Imperiums — diktieren, wer lebt und wer stirbt."

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Empereur et par la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius, je vous ordonne d'arrêter. Personne d'autre que moi et les lois de l'Imperium ne dispose d'un droit de vie ou de mort sur les passagers de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Empereur et par la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius, je vous ordonne d'arrêter. Personne d'autre que moi et les lois de l'Imperium ne dispose d'un droit de vie ou de mort sur les passagers de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: «En el nombre del Emperador y por la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, te ordeno que pares. En esta nave, nadie salvo yo (y las leyes del Imperium) dicta quién vive y quién muere».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: «En el nombre del Emperador y por la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, te ordeno que pares. En esta nave, nadie salvo yo (y las leyes del Imperium) dicta quién vive y quién muere».

languages.text: "İmparator namına, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un iradesiyle sana durmanı emrediyorum. Bu gemide kimin yaşayıp kimin öleceğine yalnızca ben ve İmparatorluk kanunları karar verir."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor and by the will of Rogue Trader von Valancius, I order you to stop. On this ship, none but I — and the Imperium's laws — can dictate who lives and who dies."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator namına, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un iradesiyle sana durmanı emrediyorum. Bu gemide yalnızca ben ve İmparatorluk kanunları, kimin yaşayıp kimin öleceğine karar verir."
